joblist.summary:
InternshipAs a Software Engineer in the Infrastructure team, you will play an active role in bringing value-added technical developments/ solutions to the company. You constantly seek for innovative ways to include automation in processes while optimizing and strengthening our current services and system security. Specifically, you build platforms to manages large scale of servers, enable intelligent operation and enhance enterprise security.
Job Description
Develop internal used platform which includes Asset/monitoring/security management platform, etc.
Develop software modules for technical operation automation and visualization
Job Requirements
Currently pursuing a bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Science, Engineering or related field
Good understanding of computer systems
Experience with backend programming languages (Python)
Experience with client-side application programming (Javascript)
Good knowledge of relational database (MySQL, Postgresql etc.)
Experience in the following areas is a plus:
Experience with Ansible
Experience with web development using existing frameworks
Experience with human-computer interactions
Able to write clean and maintainable code
Willing to learn and dare to try new things
Good communication skills, problem-solving and creative thinking abilities and the ability to respond to request in a short time

Summary
Posted: Oct 17, 2018
Weekly Hours: 40
Role Number: 113394790
We’re a diverse collection of thinkers and doers, continually reimagining our products, systems, and practices to help people do what they love in new ways. A deeply reciprocal place, where everything we build is the result of people in different roles and teams working together to make each other’s ideas stronger. That same real passion for innovation that goes into our products also applies to our practices, strengthening our commitment to leave the world better than we found it.
There is a superb opportunity for a hardworking Java Software Engineer with a consistent record of delivering complex software applications to work as part of a global Software Engineering team.
Key Qualifications
Experience in object-oriented programming (Java, J2EE, Spring or other MVC framework)
Deep understanding and hands on experience in development of Service Oriented Architectures and RESTFUL services using JAX-RS
Usage of source version control software (e.g. Git)
Familiar with Test Driven Development using testing frameworks like Mockito, PowerMock etc.
Knowledge of a major relational or NoSQL database (e.g. Oracle / Cassandra)
An understanding of distributed messaging systems
Knowledge of data structures, design patterns, architectural styles and API design
Dedication to code quality with experience of automated testing techniques (both static and dynamic)
Evaluating and defining requirements and problem statements
Developing technical documentation, diagrams & flowcharts
Knowledge of containerisation of applications using Docker will be an added advantage
Knowledge of AWS or other cloud technologies is a strong positive
Description
The role requires an excellent grasp of technical concepts with a proven understanding of the full development life cycle process with a forward thinking mindset, ability and confidence to challenge the status quo.
Education & Experience
Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or relevant industry experience or equivalent is required.

Job Description :
A global top tier commodities trading firm is looking for a Quant Strategist to work in the trading desk, building tools and trading strategies.

Main responsibilities:
Actively participate in the discovery and prototyping of new quantitative tools to unveil new trading opportunities
Provide trading strategies based in the current models/tools and the analysis of market factors.
Discover and develop new signals and models to forecast market-agents activity that influence on prices.
Work with all the commodity traders in the discovery and design of new quantitative strategies
Participate in the formation and execution of World Trading Group (WTG) trading strategies.
Development of trading analytic tools and quantitative strategies in all the commodities in production environments
Maintain/enhance existing quantitative models/strategies in the commodities space to help explaining market agent's behavior.
Development and maintenance of advanced statistical systems to assess ensemble accuracy
Periodically back-test strategies/signals and ensemble systems.

The successful candidate must have the following:
PhD or MSci. degree in a quantitative discipline (statistics, computer-science, engineering, quantitative finance, etc.)
Strong statistical/modelling skills including: data-mining, supervising and unsupervised learning, optimization, deep learning and reinforcement learning (at least 1 year).
Strong knowledge in Python programming (3+ years) in academic or professional environments.
Advance knowledge in C/C++/ Java or similar OOP language, and familiarity with Linux.
Experience with data bases (SQL, Hive, NoSQL).
Experience with professional development in enterprise environment (Version Control systems, Testing, Profiling and Continuous Integration)
Experience with distributed systems (Apache Spark, Hadoop, Hive, etc.)
Some knowledge of statistical trading strategies, backtesting, model assessment and model selection
Experience developing application with pandas, numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, tensorflow, CUDA, boto and matplotlib.
If you believe you fit the requirements for the role, please click APPLY NOW or call 6854 5620 for a confidential discussion, or send CV directly to arya.zhao@ambition.com.sg
Data provided is for recruitment purposes only. Business License Number: 200611680D. EA Registration Number: R1656980
Ambition not only recruits on behalf of some exceptional companies but due to unprecedented growth, Ambition is also looking for talented individuals to join our fantastic recruitment business. To apply for Ambition's current global opportunities click .
